title: Is abstinence the only option?
content:
Answer: **NOT REALLY.** Not having sex (or abstinence) is one way to prevent pregnancy and other health risks. But there are other ways that also protect against sexually transmitted infections like HIV. For starters, condoms are an effective way to prevent pregnancy and STIs.

To learn more about family planning,  contact **UMATI: Call: Zelda Mongi (Counsellor):+255 754264981, +255 715264981; TAYOA: Send a text to 15017 or call the National Health Helpline (117)**
